name: opencloud
description: OpenCloud is a self-hosted private cloud solution that provides file storage, collaborative editors, email, chat, and more through a browser-based interface, similar to Nextcloud.
features: File storage: Upload, organize, and share files with folder structures and permission controls for team collaboration.
Document editing: Collaborate on documents, spreadsheets, and presentations using integrated office suite compatibility.
Calendar and contacts: Manage schedules and address books with CalDAV and CardDAV sync to mobile devices.
Email integration: Access email accounts through webmail interface with IMAP support for unified communication.
Chat and video: Communicate with team members using built-in messaging and video conferencing capabilities.
App ecosystem: Extend functionality with community apps for notes, tasks, bookmarks, and specialized workflows.
Mobile sync: Access files and data from iOS and Android devices with native apps for offline availability.
External storage: Connect to S3, FTP, and other storage backends to unify access across multiple systems.
